RTCInboundRtpStreamStatsReceiverId.summary: The receiverId property of the dictionary specifies the of the or object representing the receiving the stream.
RTCInboundRtpStreamStatsReceiverId.value: A string which contains the ID of the RTCAudioReceiverStats or RTCVideoReceiverStats object which provides information about the RTCRtpReceiver which is receiving the streamed media.
